item.title: 企业主管离职后，苹果将重组销售部门
item.description: 苹果公司负责企业销售和西欧市场的高管计划于今年晚些时候离职，这标志着一位长期管理者的最新离职。【原文：Apple Inc.’s top executive overseeing enterprise sales and the western European market is planning to depart the company later this year, marking the latest exit of a long-tenured manager.】

item.title: 前国会议员支持小额债券减税政策
item.description: 一群共和党人站出来支持市政免税，威胁到他们党今年最重要的税收法案可能会增加收入。【原文：A group of Republicans is standing up for the municipal tax-exemption, threatening a possible revenue raiser for their party’s marquee tax bill this year.】

item.title: 西班牙的 Cuerpo 称贝森特表示希望欧盟就关税问题达成协议
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）表示，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他希望美国与欧盟就关税问题达成协议。【原文：Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo said Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent indicated that he wants a US-European Union deal on tariffs.】

item.title: 加拿大央行可能暂停评估关税冲击：决策指南
item.description: 加拿大央行周三可能会保持利率稳定，因为官员们正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战所造成的损害。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday as officials take stock of the damage posed by US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 墨西哥加强检查，德克萨斯州边境停止燃料进口
item.description: 由于墨西哥政府因纳税问题打击进口，从得克萨斯州运往墨西哥的燃料运输已经停顿。【原文：Fuel shipments from Texas headed to Mexico have ground to a halt as the Mexican government cracks down on imports over tax payments.】

item.title: Sunnova 努力赢得债权人生命线以避免破产
item.description: Sunnova Energy International Inc.曾经是一家高歌猛进的屋顶太阳能电池板销售商，如今却在苦苦挣扎，据熟悉此事的人士透露，该公司很难说服债权人为其提供新的现金，从而避免破产。【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc., the once high-flying seller of rooftop solar panels that’s now struggling to stay afloat, is having difficulty convincing creditors to provide it with fresh cash so it can avoid bankruptcy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 扎克伯格称曾考虑在 2018 年分拆 Instagram
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格曾考虑在 2018 年将 Instagram 分拆为一家独立公司，因为他越来越担心这款照片和视频应用的成功会损害 Facebook 社交网络。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg considered spinning off Instagram into a separate company in 2018 as he increasingly became concerned that the photo and video app’s success was hurting the Facebook social network.】

item.title: 特朗普迫使中国提出关税提议以平息贸易战
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普呼吁中国与他进行接触，以启动旨在解决世界两大经济体之间不断升级的贸易斗争的谈判。【原文：President Donald Trump called on China to reach out to him in order to kick off negotiations aimed at resolving the escalating trade fight between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会回击政府道德办公室要求查阅部分机构数据的请求
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）政府效率团队的一名成员要求美国证券交易委员会代理主席马克-植田（Mark Uyeda）允许读写一些机构数据。【原文：A member of Elon Musk’s government efficiency team asked Securities and Exchange Commission Acting Chairman Mark Uyeda to grant read and write access to some agency data, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管英国央行采取了一些措施，但卢布交易员仍对稳定的前景抱有信心
item.description: 期权交易商们将目光投向了周三加拿大央行的决定之外，并押注未来几天无论是否降息，卢比的前景都将相对稳定。【原文：Options traders are looking beyond Wednesday’s Bank of Canada decision and betting on a relatively steady outlook for the loonie in the days ahead, without or without an interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 中国出动美国黑客进行攻击，间谍游戏的新领域
item.description: 据分析人士称，中国揭露美国国家安全局黑客的指控标志着中美情报机构之间持续针锋相对的重大升级。【原文：China’s outing of alleged US National Security Agency hackers marks a major escalation in the ongoing tit-for-tat between Chinese and American intelligence agencies, according to analysts.】

item.title: 据说 Fivespan 将入股生命科学集团 Qiagen
item.description: 据知情人士透露，激进投资者 Fivespan Partners 已入股荷兰诊断公司 Qiagen NV。【原文：Activist investor Fivespan Partners has built a stake in Dutch diagnostics firm Qiagen NV, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 为什么特朗普的汽车关税会导致汽车价格上涨？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统打赌，对进口汽车和汽车零部件征收 25% 的关税将为美国带来更多的制造业。【原文：President Donald Trump is betting that a 25% tariff on imports of vehicles and automotive parts will bring more manufacturing to US shores.】

item.title: Anthropic 准备推出语音助手功能，与 OpenAI 竞争
item.description: Anthropic公司即将为其Claude聊天机器人推出一款新的语音助手产品，而在竞争对手OpenAI开始为ChatGPT用户推出类似产品近一年之后。【原文：Anthropic is nearing the launch of a new voice assistant product for its Claude chatbot, nearly a year after rival OpenAI began rolling out a similar option for ChatGPT users.】

item.title: 特朗普家族在买者自慎的细价股世界中加深关系
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的长子和儿媳入股右翼基督教广播网络塞勒姆传媒集团公司（Salem Media Group Inc.【原文：President Donald Trump’s eldest son and daughter-in-law took a stake in right-wing Christian radio network Salem Media Group Inc., spurring a sharp rally in the stock and involving the family in a market associated with opaque, buyer-beware companies.】

item.title: 阿波罗称公司债券交易成本在市场动荡中飙升
item.description: 根据阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Bond dealers started demanding higher compensation for the risk of trading investment-grade corporate debt after President Donald Trump’s trade war sent volatility racing through markets, according to an analysis by Apollo Global Management Inc.】

item.title: 只知道牛市的散户投资者正在买入跌市
item.description: 关税动荡撕碎了华尔街上上下下的投资游戏规则。但在远离曼哈顿的内华达沙漠中，布兰登-阿内特却坚持着他毕生奉行的零售交易口号：逢低买入。【原文：Tariff turmoil has shredded investing play books up and down Wall Street. But far from Manhattan, in the Nevada desert, Brandon Arnett is sticking to the retail trading mantra that’s worked for all his life: Buy the dip.】

item.title: 私人信贷公司柳树寻求出售股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私人信贷公司 Willow Tree Credit Partners 正在探索各种方案，包括出售少数股权。【原文：Private credit firm Willow Tree Credit Partners is exploring options including the sale of a minority stake, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 巴克莱称，关税动荡中的投资组合交易表现强劲
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）分析师在一份报告中指出，在近期关税引发的波动中，一种流行的买卖一篮子公司债券的方法（即投资组合交易）依然强劲。【原文：A popular method of buying and selling baskets of corporate bonds, known as portfolio trading, remained strong during the recent volatility triggered by tariffs, according to a report from analysts at Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 摩根大通将为亿万富翁约翰-戈夫的沃斯堡新办公室提供支持
item.description: 亿万富翁约翰-戈夫（John Goff）正在扩大他在沃斯堡的综合开发项目，新办公楼将由摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Billionaire John Goff is expanding his Fort Worth mixed-use development with a new office building anchored by JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 秘鲁经济放缓超过预期，国内生产总值目标受挫
item.description: 秘鲁 2 月份的经济增长放缓幅度超过预期，政府加倍努力实现将经济产出提高到七年来最快速度的目标。【原文：Peru’s economic growth slowed more than expected in February, as the government doubles down on its target of boosting economic output to its fastest pace in seven years.】

item.title: 扎克伯格就有关 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 交易的电子邮件作证
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）周二回到联邦法院，回答有关他收购 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 的问题。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg returned to federal court on Tuesday to answer questions about his acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp, which are at the center of a federal antitrust lawsuit that seeks to unwind the deals more than a decade after they were completed.】

item.title: 中东夏季即将来临，炼油商触底反弹
item.description: 石油市场上最脏的燃料之一，在该行业应对需求疲软的前景时，给许多炼油商带来了利润。【原文：One of the oil market’s dirtiest fuels is giving many refiners’ margins a boost as the industry contends with a weaker demand outlook.】

item.title: 智利总统候选人将调查 SQM-Codelco锂矿交易
item.description: 智利主要总统候选人正着手审查锂供应商 SQM 与国有企业 Codelco 去年签署的一项具有里程碑意义的协议。【原文：Chile’s leading presidential candidate is embarking on a review of a landmark deal signed last year between lithium supplier SQM and state-owned Codelco.】

item.title: 伊拉克将在联邦预算中下调石油价格以应对市场暴跌
item.description: 欧佩克第二大产油国伊拉克计划在市场暴跌后削减联邦预算中的油价假设。【原文：Iraq, OPEC’s second-largest producer, plans to cut its oil-price assumption in the federal budget after the market plunged.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战利用关税漏洞引发美国仓库倒闭潮
item.description: 美国进口商希望避开特朗普政府的关税，正在拼命寻找一种仓库空间，这种仓库可以让他们在不缴纳关税的情况下将商品存放长达五年之久。【原文：US importers looking to sidestep Trump administration tariffs are desperately seeking space in a type of warehouse that lets them stash merchandise for as long as five years without paying duties.】

item.title: 华尔街银行为阿波罗交易背负 22 亿美元债务
item.description: 自特朗普政府不到两周前引发全球贸易战以来，这是华尔街首次陷入大额融资困境。【原文：Lenders are now saddled with $2.2 billion in debt for an acquisition linked to a Canadian auto parts company, the first time Wall Street has been stuck with a big financing package since the Trump administration triggered a global trade war less than two weeks ago.】

item.title: 亿万富翁普拉特的 BlueCrest 公司获准在迪拜开展业务
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克尔-普拉特（Michael Platt）的私人投资公司在迪拜获得了全面的监管授权，迪拜近年来已成为吸引资金经理的地方。【原文：Billionaire Michael Platt’s private investment firm has received full regulatory authorization in Dubai, which has emerged as a magnet for money managers in recent years.】

item.title: 债权人寻求迫使中国建筑商鑫苑破产
item.description: 据一份法庭文件显示，中国开发商鑫苑置业有限公司的债权人正在纽约寻求迫使该公司进入破产保护程序，以收回去年到期的债券。【原文：Creditors of Chinese developer Xinyuan Real Estate Co Ltd. are seeking to force the company into bankruptcy protection in New York in order to collect on bonds that were due last year, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 南非央行称不确定性可能导致利率上升
item.description: 南非央行警告说，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）咄咄逼人的贸易关税政策下，南非央行对通胀前景越来越感到怀疑，因此全球借贷成本可能会在更长时间内保持较高水平。【原文：South Africa’s central bank cautioned that borrowing costs around the world are likely to remain higher for longer as it grows doubtful about the inflation outlook amid US President Donald Trump’s aggressive trade tariffs.】
